name: Running out of Sugar
description:
Help me! I need more sugar or else I won’t have the energy to finish my game for the Ludum Dare! All I need to do is to eat the food falling down. But beware of what you make me eat!

This is my participation for the Ludum Dare 39. Instructions are in game. The game is not well balanced and it is very difficult to lose, but I hope it is still fun!
